items.sentence: Tom is one of the best singers I\'ve ever heard.
I don\'t want Tom to drive. He\'s been drinking.
I don\'t want to start anything I can\'t finish.
I had no idea that Tom knew how to speak French.
Tom left the office without even saying goodbye.
Tom likes to rest on the couch after a long day.
Tom listens to the radio while eating breakfast.
I wish I could give you something, but I can\'t.
I haven\'t written any new poems in a long time.
I hope Tom does everything he\'s promised to do.
I hope we both don\'t end up being disappointed.
We left without telling anybody we were leaving.
We started studying French in elementary school.
Where\'s that bottle of wine I asked you to buy?
Tom, I\'m scared we\'re going to get in trouble.
Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary was in the hospital.
Tom wasn\'t the only person that Mary talked to.
Tom wasn\'t with Mary when her purse was stolen.
I just didn\'t want you to go there by yourself.
Tom and Mary are married, but not to each other.
Tom and Mary are studying for their French test.
Tom and Mary argue with each other all the time.
Tom had to do it even though he didn\'t want to.
It looks like Tom doesn\'t want to talk to Mary.
Tom didn\'t find Mary\'s story very interesting.
Tom didn\'t have any reason why he couldn\'t go.
Tom came over yesterday with one of his friends.
Tom can be a little difficult to get along with.
Were you able to do everything you wanted to do?
What would you do in a situation like this, Tom?
Why don\'t you do something about the situation?
I\'ll agree to the terms if you lower the price.
I\'ll get in touch with you as soon as I arrive.
I\'ll have all this stuff ready for you by 2:30.
I\'ll make an effort to complete the work today.
Tom tried to prevent Mary from joining the army.
I\'m looking for someone who understands French.
Juggling is actually a lot easier than it looks.
Just be sure to leave your passport in the safe.
I still can\'t play guitar as well as I want to.
Your French is really good. Where did you study?
Your camera may be stolen if you leave it there.
I have got to leave here early tomorrow morning.
I have no idea where Tom actually hid the money.
I have no intention of meddling in your affairs.
I have nowhere near enough money to buy a house.
I have one older brother and one younger sister.
I\'m sure Tom will explain it to you eventually.
I\'m sure that Tom will be delighted to see you.
I\'ve got a magazine article I want to show you.
